channel.title: Wtf just happened?
channel.description: So i was helping some guy on skype and trying to teach him how to program and i broke my mic so i cant talk... He starts begging me and i say if you want to make games download gamemaker.exe(safe file i use everyday). I say can't help him because its too hard without a mic and im too lazy to type it out... He thinks im a hacker when i showed him my coding of a rpg! Wtf does it come to getting to help people! I think i might wait a bit to help another programmer! Link of pic me programming my rpg: [url=http://prntscr.com/1tmuya]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3606781/wtfisthis.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3606781/wtfisthis.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Wtf just happened?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This is not the place to complain about helping people, that’d be Facebook. If you do your best to help somebody, then that’s all that you can do. I’m sure he’ll be grateful for anything you told him somewhere down the line.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf just happened?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This topic doesn’t really serve any purpose other than you venting over an argument you had with someone. Perhaps change the topic to “What difficulties have you encountered while helping others” or something along those lines, otherwise this topic will be locked as there is no discussion to engage in.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf just happened?

item.description:
@Techkid wrote:

So i was helping some guy on skype and trying to teach him how to program and i broke my mic so i cant talk… He starts begging me and i say if you want to make games download gamemaker.exe(safe file i use everyday). I say can’t help him because its too hard without a mic and im too lazy to type it out… He thinks im a hacker when i showed him my coding of a rpg! Wtf does it come to getting to help people! I think i might wait a bit to help another programmer!
